wasara 85k pamana parani bujjomuwa dumriya sthanaye athi adu padu sampurna kara ganimata pradeshawasihu idiripath wi sitithi.me sandaha “dumriya sthana sanwardhana padanama” namin sanwidhanayak da pihituwagena thibe.ema sanwidhanaya mangin pasugiyada dumriya departhamenthuwe niyojya prawahana adhikari ee. di. es. senewirathna mahathata dumriya sthanaye adu padu penwa dena ladi.sanwidhanaya mangin karana lada illima kerehi wishesha awadhanaya yomukara hakithak durata ema illim itukara dimata piyawara ganna bawa mehidi niyojya adhikariwaraya pawasiya.kinawala purana wiharadhipathi kinawala aayupala nahimi, bujjomuwa shri bodhimalu wiharadhipathi ganekande gunarathana, udakakulawala purana wiharadhipathi bowala sumanathissa yana himiwaru mehidi anushasana pawathwuha.bujjomuwa dumriya sthanadhipathi punyasiri kumara, pradeshiya sabha manthri sumith priyantha mahathwaru da me awasthawata sahabhagi wuha..
